title: Shattered
description: With true crime classics like Descent into Hell and Die My Love, author Kathryn Casey has peered into the darkest corners of the Lone Star State, shedding a fascinating, chilling light on a series of notorious Texas murders. In Shattered she explores in riveting detail an infamous Houston-area crime: the brutal slaying of a young mother and her unborn child by the person closest to them.
author: Kathryn Casey
